[extra]
Hirotada Tokugawa and I did some brainstorming some time ago and 
t=
his clip was part of a longer narrative involving Matsudaira 
Katamori's br=
other Sadaaki, who was the Kyoto Shoshidai. However, we 
didn't finish enou=
gh of the story to make a new installment of the 
Shinsengumi radio talk sh=
ow.

So pretend that this is a message on the Shinsengumi answering 
machin=
e...
http://www.streamload.com/secretarytocapt3/takedawhining.mp3

now Take=
da turned to speak to a "sensei" who may be...Itou
***films such as Gohatto=
 and the story which inspired it are all 
based on rumors that Takeda was a=
 homosexual however, we honestly do 
not know if that was the case. Further=
more, we do know that Kondou 
Isami did mention homosexual activity within =
the Shinsengumi in a 
letter to his friends...so who knows ::hehehehehe:::
=

Screencaps of IkeDIEya may be downloaded here
http://www.shinsengumihq.com=
/MFD.htm

***Bunny 
"Why does Pachi-kun have a band-aid all over his face? =
And he also 
took the lead!"

It seems that the two kids who made the film =
are huge fans of all 
Shinsengumi universes. Their design for Nagakura was =
probably 
inspired by Peacemaker Kurogane's Nagakura who has a band-aid on =
his 
nose.

The creators of the movie really admire Nagakura who took their=
 call 
on the Shinsengumi radio show "Kyokuchou Hour" (episodes can be 
fou=
nd here http://www.shinsengumihq.com/MFD.htm).

Also information we have on=
 Ikedaya is based on Nagakura's account 
so it is funny to have an "exagger=
ated" account by the captain of 
the second squad.

***Kikue Mugen
"You kno=
w, I'm motivated now to create something
like that"

I hope you do! I think=
 we need to see more fanwork. Also people can 
try to incorporate the Shins=
engumi into school assignments as well 
so they can kill two birds with one=
 stone=97have FUN [and] get a grade 
(^_^).

ot allowing

2 scenes which could not be made due to time constraints

1)montage o=
f dead bodies of the Choshu warriors (partially emptied 
jelly candy)injure=
d Shinsengumi (blue marshmallow peeps) with their 
candy limbs torn away an=
d covered in blood (red tempura paint)...I 
was afraid my refrigerator (the=
 set) would get too messed up 
but...well Barb provided a solution after th=
e film was 
completed...saran wrap to catch all the paint/blood

2)the "Mat=
rix" effect. Many of us have seen the Matrix flying kick 
parodied over and=
 over again...it is very easy to replicate...in 
fact one of the jellies (C=
hoshu baddie) is supposed to be suspended 
in mid-air while trying to attac=
k Kondou. The digital camera would 
then rotate around the suspended jelly =
(and thread airbrushed out 
later)...however the tripod for my camera was n=
ot stable (kept 
sagging) and the images came out all a bit crooked so I to=
ssed those 
files. I had planned to have Kondou jump up and slice his attac=
ker 
and do a slow motion of the jelly sliding out of its container (as a 
=
stand in for blood and guts)...I still wish I could do this scene 
however,=
 Kondou is now part of my tuna salad (he is just a boiled 
egg you know).
